modName: Tanlines and Freckles for Barbarian Skin UNP
summary: Adds Tanlines and optional Freckles for the famous Barbarian skin from HoneyVanity
descriptionHtml:
[heading]DESCRIPTION[/heading]
If the normal Tanlines doesn\'t look good, choose the Darker/Brighter options. Choose only one file.

This mod changes the Barbarian Skin\'s Body texture to a tanned or/and freckled version. THIS IS NOT A STANDALONE VERSION! YOU NEED 
[list]
[*]HoneyVanity\'s ORIGINAL FROM HERE: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24318
[*]ALSO YOU NEED THE DIMONIZED UNP BODY FIRST: Dimon99 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
[/list]
This should work with UNP and UNPB too. Contains only the Body texture.

If you want tattoos on it check out my other mod *RESOURCE PSD ALSO [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30027]here[/url]

FEATURES
THESE FILES ARE UNCOMPRESSED! (Body~20Mb)

- Freckled/Hairy options of Tanned (Brighter/Darker) and other skin options) 2048x2048 body textures.
- Freckled/Hairy options of the Original 2048x2048 body textures.
- Freckled textures contains the matching face texture (You don\'t HAVE to use it, but for best results I highly recommend it.)

[heading]INSTALLATION[/heading]
Manual install: Please Back up your files before using this.

1. Extract to the Game\'s folder and overwrite.
2. Enjoy

Using a Custom Race (probably you do): If you use a custom race, overwrite the textures in the custom race directory. Texture paths change from race to race, check their zips to find where are their textures.

NMM Install:
Well...you know the drill.

[heading]MORE INFO[/heading]

How to look like on the pics:
[list]
[*]Maps and sk maps from: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21387]Maori Body Tattoo and tanlines UNPB Version 2 by kruaka27[/url]
[*]Sweaty spectacular maps from: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28946]Sporty Sexy Sweat - wet body skin texture - CBBE UNP UNPB [*]ADEC Vanilla by Xs2reality[/url]
[*]Skeleton for the same curves: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32 [/url] (absolutley not necessary, but good)
[*]Face: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7897]envision Face by DD AKT[/url] with larger lips.
[/list]

Can i learn what lightning/enb/fxaa etc. mods you are using?
 -  Ofc, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781]Project ENB by Bronze316[/url],
 -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting by JJC71[/url], 
 -  [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043]Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus[/url]

What are my future plans? [i](note for myself too, before i forget them...)[/i]
- One day i will do tanlines for other skins. I\'m an idiot and i modified the textures itself. Well, personally i think it looks better. Not perfect tho. But with my limited photoshop skill i can\'t port it, i can only make a new.

----Bugs, any Error----
If something wrong with the mod, tell me (even if its only a texture)

---- Changelog -----
UPDATE V1.6
[list]
[*]Tan fix: Left and Right breast tans are now identical.
UPDATE V1.4
[*]wrong Hair placing. Fixed.
[*]Added Files for Dark skin (aka Redguard)
UPDATE V1.3
[*]Barbarian tanlines edit: Darker. [i](still looks like shit on full pale game option...not a surprise)[/i] it was indeed too bright.
[*]Panty tans edit, I like it this way. [i](5th time redone...I needed a beer for that)[/i]
UPDATE V1.2
[*]Thanks to Rost3, he let me use his freckle texture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15766
[*]Reuploaded everything + uploaded the Freckled skins
[*]Barbarian panty tans redone, now everything look much better.
UPDATE V1.1
[*] There was a Map<->Texture mismatch on the barbarian skins. Fixed.
[*] Some Detail improvement on the barbarian skins [i](down there)[/i]
[/list]

[heading]CREDITS[/heading]
Thanks to *HoneyVanity who let me to use that amazing Barbarian Skin! - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24318
With full admire: Dimon99 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Thanks to Rost3\'s for the amazing freckle texture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15766


---- Contact ----
You have questions? Fell free to PM me!
author: Gregi
